title: J. Matthew Gerken ft. Bill Callahan - John Tyler: Hindsight Fall
description:
As recently reported, songwriters Christian Kiefer, Matthew Gerken, and Jefferson Pitcher recruited pals from the indie rock world including Mark Kozelek, Jamie Stewart of Xiu Xiu, and members of Califone to help them realize Of Great and Mortal Men: 43 Songs for 43 Presidencies. Here is Smog&#039;s Bill Callahan singing about No. 10, John Tyler. No surprise-- he makes it sound like a Bill Callahan song, I guess it&#039;s all in the phrasing. And yes, Ol&#039; Tippecanoe is mentioned. 


"" from -> http://www.pitchforkmedia.com/article/download/51433-bill-callahan-john-tyler-hindsight-falls-on-deaf-ears-stream



--



Grabbed from an imeem link & converted flv -> mp3.

An example of the great talent that is Bill Callahan (Smog).
